attributes.action: Fuel prices to be capped at 1 low price across the country
attributes.additional_details: - It costs twice as much to fill up a car in the UK than it does in the USA.
attributes.background: Government to cap all fuel prices across the country to the lowest available price. This will make it more affordable for small businesses to operate as well as ensure the average family can afford to get around. Fuel is taxed to an extortionate degree and the UK has one of the highest fuel prices.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
